title: Moon through Young Sunflowers
medium: gouache, pencil, and watercolor on paper
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles E. Burchfield [1893-1967], West Seneca, NY; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY, until 1956 [1]; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1956 until April 1967; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1967.

Notes:
[1]. See "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994.

creator.death_place: West Seneca (Erie county, New York state, United States)
